statements: SELECT * FROM competitor_marketing_data;
SELECT competitor_name, campaign_type FROM competitor_marketing_data;
SELECT competitor_id, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE campaign_type = 'digital';
SELECT competitor_name, campaign_type FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT competitor_id, marketing_campaign_id FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE competitor_id = '12345678-9876-4321-8765-1234567890AB';
SELECT competitor_name, campaign_type FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE campaign_end_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE campaign_type = 'Digital';
SELECT competitor_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE campaign_type = 'Print' AND campaign_start_date < '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitor_marketing_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data;
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_campaign, campaign_start_date FROM competitor_data;
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_campaign, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM competitor_data WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_campaign, spent FROM competitor_data JOIN marketing_metrics ON competitor_data.id = marketing_metrics.competitor_id;
SELECT competitor_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM competitor_data JOIN marketing_metrics ON competitor_data.id = marketing_metrics.competitor_id WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_campaign, campaign_start_date FROM competitor_data WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT competitor_name, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM competitor_data JOIN marketing_metrics ON competitor_data.id = marketing_metrics.competitor_id GROUP BY competitor_name;
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_campaign, spent FROM competitor_data JOIN marketing_metrics ON competitor_data.id = marketing_metrics.competitor_id WHERE impressions > 10000 AND conversions > 100;
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_campaign, campaign_end_date FROM competitor_data ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CompetitorCompany;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM CompetitorCompany ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM CompetitorCompany WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM CompetitorCompany ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM CompetitorCompany WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignPerformance ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM CompetitorCompany WHERE location = 'New York' AND industry = 'Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM competitors;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, industry FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, campaign_id, impressions, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_text FROM ad_copy WHERE LENGTH(ad_text) > 100;
SELECT competitor_name, industry, headquarters_address FROM competitors;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_text, ad_image_url FROM ad_copy WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, website_url FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM competitors;
SELECT id, name, industry FROM competitors ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, impression_count FROM ad_campaigns WHERE cost_per_click < 1.5 ORDER BY impression_count DESC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, cost FROM ad_performance WHERE date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_name, cost_per_click, impression_count FROM ad_campaigns WHERE ad_type = 'Display';
SELECT c.name AS competitor_name, cc.channel_name, cc.platform FROM competitors c JOIN marketing_campaigns mc ON c.id = mc.competitor_id JOIN marketing_channels cc ON cc.id = mc.id;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions, cost FROM ad_campaigns WHERE cost_per_click > 1.5 AND impression_count > 10000;
